N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7422.8 - Special visits

State Regulations

Each secure facility shall implement procedures that govern
special visits and the conditions of such visits. Such visits shall include, but not be limited to, visits from persons who have traveled long distances, visits to hospitalized residents, visits to residents on modified services
program status, non-contact visits, and visits between residents and their
attorneys. Notes
